conclusion: Light source moves from the left to the right, directly above the objects.
Shadows of the objects will shift accordingly as the light source moves.
Shadow of the blue object will move to the right as the light source moves to the right.
Size of the shadows will change.
Shadow of the blue object will become larger and shift to the right.
Orientation of the shadows will change.
Shadow of the blue object will become more vertical and will be cast to the right.
Shadow A will be larger and cast to the right.
Shadow B will be larger and cast to the right.
Shadow C will be larger and cast to the right.
Shadow D will be larger and cast to the right.
Final shadows will be larger and cast to the right, indicating the light source is moving to the right.
